text: Hi guys, im doing google chrome extension, I trying to figure out how to display all the template module available. any idea how to retrieve it. thanks

You’d have to use the api or pull the data somehow from the design manager when the user is in the DM

BTW the dev community built <#CBBAW6Z3R|community-browser-extension> feel free to add to it it’s open source
I tried to check on html on designer manager. but I just want to check if I can use some variable array for the list of module

like I said safest way is probably to use an API(relying on HubSpot’s HTML to have the data or relying on javascript that is controlled by HS is not a stable way of doing it, as it could change and break). I’m not sure if custom modules show when using the files API, but I believe one of the API’s should show custom modules because HubSpot’s FTP is actually just an abstraction of the API’s. <@UFBNA9K9A> - seems like something you would know
So we don’t have a public API for modules yet, but that’s being worked on now, so if you can hold off for just a bit we’ll have the solution for you
